name: The Twisted World of Marge Simpson
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Jennifer Crittenden
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Marge enters the pretzel vending business, but when she fails, Homer recruits some help from the mob.
